section.p: This list contains all supported attributes:

li.p: An URI to the XSLT script. The existence of this attribute marks an element as being an XSLT-Conref.
An URI to the XML source. If not specified, the file of the XSLT-Conref will be used as input.
The name of a template to be executed on start. If specified, no context item will be set.
Selects a specific entry from a map of resolved elements that is returned and cached from a single transformation.
Instead of just referencing some transformation result with this attribute the resolved content can be copied into the document to preserve a specific state.
Specifies in which phase of processing this XSLT-Conref element should be resolved. This depends on if the resolved content will define keys or if for resolving the defined keys need to be known.
All attributes within this namespace will be passes as parameters to the XSLT script.

section.p: The namespace prefixes need have the following URI:
